Class Letter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Letter

  • public class Letter
extends java.lang.Object
    Letter class. Models a letter that someone can create and send to another person. The letter has 3 fields: From: The person who is sending the letter. To: The person that will receive the letter. Body: The contents of the letter.
    Since:
    2017-05-28
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joao Berardo

      java.lang.String getFrom()
      Returns the name of the person who is sending the letter.
      java.lang.String getText()
      Returns the letter's body.
      java.lang.String getTo()
      Returns the name of the person who this letter is addressed to.
